channel.title: Ace Trace Video Editor
channel.description: Recent content on Ace Trace Video Editor

item.description: F.A.Q. How do I add a line? In manual mode you can mark a few points, and the app will create a smooth line using then. Find the object with the cursor in the editor, then tag a [+] plus button to add the point. Scroll video using the scrollbar below the editor. Can Ace Trace do it automatically? We’re working on it right now, we have some good results already.

Privacy Policy When you first use Ace Trace, we ask you for access to your photo library so we can read your videos and modify them. Video data is extremely sensitive, and we believe it’s important for you to know and understand what we do with that data. Upon exporting of your edited video we will ask you if you’d like to share it with us. We firmly believe that your data belongs to you.

Privacy Policy When you first use Ace Trace, we ask you for access to your photo library so we can read your videos and modify them. Video data is extremely sensitive, and we believe it’s important for you to know and understand what we do with that data. We firmly believe that your data belongs to you. As such, Ace Trace does not collect, store, or share any videos, or data that can be used to identify or contact a specific individual.

item.title: Ace Trace community
item.description: Chat with us We welcome you to join our Telegram Chat or Discord Chat for the fastest communication. Please, share your ideas and ask questions! We’re always ready to listen to your feedback. It’s also the best place for you to pioneer some of our experimental features. Leave feedback Another way to communicate your feedback is using the form or by email Help us make it better No matter what your skills are, if you want to help, we will be always glad if you joined our humble team.

item.title: Ace Trace Maple Hill
item.description: Congratulations, you found me! Let’s create awesome highlights You can put your phone in the holder, and use me for filing your throw. Upload your video and we’ll add a line folling your disc to it. Can you match the line? You have a chance to compete with other disc golfers, trying to repeat a shot made by a pro. We will put your and the reference line in the same video, so you’ll see the double ace trace line for yourself!

item.title: Automatic Tracking
item.description: Cannot wait for the automatic tracking feature to come alive? Have free time and a computer? You’re patient and careful for details? We would like to offer you an opportunity to significantly help the project. As a reward you will get a lifetime Premium Ace Trace subscription free of charge or the money equivalent. Cannot help with automatic tracking, but still want to be a part of the Ace Trace community?

item.title: Review
item.description: function getMobileOperatingSystem() { var userAgent = navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera; // Windows Phone must come first because its UA also contains "Android" if (/windows phone/i.test(userAgent)) { return "Windows Phone"; } if (/android/i.test(userAgent)) { return "Android"; } // iOS detection from: http://stackoverflow.com/a/9039885/177710 if (/iPad|iPhone|iPod/.test(userAgent) && !window.MSStream) { return "iOS"; } return "unknown"; } function DetectAndServe(){ let os = getMobileOperatingSystem(); if (os === "Android") { window.location.href = "https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dev.ivkin.acetrace&reviewId=0"; } else if (os === "

item.title: Subscribed
item.description: You’re all set. Cannot wait to email you the good news!
